keyMoments.title: All Crew Members Now Have Bounties
keyMoments.description: For the first time, every member of the Straw Hat Pirates has a bounty from the World Government, totaling over 667 million berries.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the crew's recognition as a major threat to the World Government.

reveals.information: Total crew bounty revealed as over 667 million berries with all members wanted

keyMoments.title: Franky Family Delivers the Bounty Posters
keyMoments.description: The Franky Family arrives with the news that all Straw Hats now have bounties.
keyMoments.significance: The Franky Family plays a key role in informing the crew about their wanted status.

keyMoments.title: Franky Family Pleads for Franky to Join the Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: The Franky Family members plead with Luffy to take Franky with them when they leave Water 7 due to his wanted status.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Franky Family's loyalty and concern for their boss, setting up Franky's recruitment.

keyMoments.title: Ship Construction Progress Update
keyMoments.description: The Galley-La Company foremen work with Franky and Iceburg to complete the Straw Hats' new ship ahead of schedule.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the cooperation between former rivals in building the Thousand Sunny.
